original_text: For from day to day men came to David to help him, until there was a great army, like an army of God.
korean_text: 그 때에 사람이 날마다 다윗에게로 돌아와서 돕고자 하매 큰 군대를 이루어 하나님의 군대와 같았더라

sentences.original_text: For from day to day men came to David to help him
sentences.korean_translation: 날마다 사람들이 다윗을 돕기 위해 그에게 왔습니다

sentences.original_text: until there was a great army
